en.name: J.G.PRINCE
en.cases_description:
unlawful assembly, Protest against amendment in Farm Bill, Condemning the arrest of rahul gandhi by UP govt, condemning the gang rape and murder of young dalit women,condemning the improper maintenance of street light and unavailability of water in street taps, attempting to burn effigy of former chief minister, protesting to set up cauvery management board, demonstration demanding maintenance of road, condemning the hike in fuel price, bus fare,condemning the police attcak on the DYFI district chief, protest condemning kaarumavilai Union bank fraud, burning effigy of Narendra Modi and amidsha, conemning the arrest of P Chidambaram, protesting to provide relief to affected people of Oki storm, condemning the corruption in purchase of rafale , aondems the action of pudukadai municipality Executive officer who removed the thiyagi stupa,demaniding to close T.S receation club, condeming misuse bu cooperative joint director.
.
